content:
<start>Obligations: Dr. Jan de Vries, as an Assistant Professor at Utrecht University specializing in Machine Learning for three years, is primarily focused on the field of Transformers within machine learning applications. His interests also include compilers.<end>

Other obligation that you might have could be related to your role or department's requirements such as teaching responsibilities, research projects, administrative duties, mentoring students, attending conferences and workshops relevant to Machine Learning, maintaining academic publications in the field of Transformers and compilers.
